snippet.title: Nestlé Crunch Bowls with Häagen-Dazs Sorbet & Sugared Mint Leaves
snippet.description: Amy D. from Austin, TX created this unique recipe for the Nestlé Kitchens “All Things Chocolate Recipe Contest.” With sugared mint leaves and an edible Nestlé Crunch bowl, this recipe is the perfect dessert on a summer night. Learn more about this recipe on the Nestlé Kitchens blog.
